animeDescription: The Seibu Lions baseball team makes it to the next round of a baseball tournament thanks to the heroic efforts of its star player, Tabuchi, but the next stage will involve hard work and cooperation.  (Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Ganbare!! Tabuchi-kun!!', 'Ganbare!! Tabuchi-kun!! Gekitou Pennant Race', 'Ganbare!! Tabuchi-kun!! (ONA)']
